title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Nissan Accelerated Software-Defined Vehicle Development with AWS (IND382)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 日产如何利用AWS加速软件定义汽车开发 (IND382)
abstract: Discover how Nissan built a comprehensive SDV ecosystem and reduced software testing time by 75%, combining advanced software development environments, robust data platforms, and scalable EE architecture all powered by AWS. We'll explore how the implementation of AWS Generative AI capabilities, test automation, and custom engineering workbenches has enabled Nissan to decouple service development from vehicle development cycles, allowing for more frequent and agile service releases.
abstract_cn: 了解日产如何构建全面的软件定义汽车(SDV)生态系统，并将软件测试时间缩短75%，结合先进的软件开发环境、强大的数据平台和可扩展的电子电气架构，全部由AWS提供支持。我们将探讨AWS生成式AI能力、测试自动化和定制工程工作台的实施如何使日产能够将服务开发与车辆开发周期解耦，从而实现更频繁和敏捷的服务发布。

presenter.name: Kazuo Kajimoto
presenter.title: Principal SA & Sr. Manager of BD

presenter.name: Kazuma Sugimoto
presenter.title: General Manager, Software Engineering Department, Software Defined Vehicle Engineering Division
